title: Introduction to Data Science in Python
description: Learn essential Python techniques for data science: lambdas, csv manipulation, DataFrame querying, distributions, sampling, and t-tests.

title: Version Control
description: This course covered implementing Version Control systems, navigating and configuring using the command line, utilizing GitHub repositories, creating GitHub repositories, and effectively managing code revisions.

title: Principles of UX/UI Design
description: This course covered fundamentals of User Experience (UX) design and research. It also covered Front-End Web Development, creating wireframes and prototypes in Figma
